creator: bugzillaapache@soebes.de
text: Currently the delivered ant.cmd files are not working on Windows 7 etc. cause they are OS/2 executables which will fail on Windows 7 etc. It would be nice having working ant.cmd files for Windows X etc. and remove the OS/2 support ?

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
Is ant.bat lacking anything a cmd file could achieve?

I wouldn't have any problem with renaming, rather than removing the OS/2 file. Unfortunately I'm not much of a Windows cmd hacker - take my initial question as an evidence for this ;-)

creator: gabriel.szabo@sk.ibm.com
text: *** Bug 60877 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
